snippet.title: A: how can i remove checkboxes text
snippet.description: Wrap it in a label. The nice thing about wrapping in a label is that the label will be clickable as well. <label id="myLabel"><input type="checkbox" value="1500-374-Tom Cruise" class="ImdbAddArtist" name="artist[]">Tom Cruise</label> …

snippet.title: A: Computing GoogleShare of N Terms
snippet.description: It depends. First, let's lay a little groundwork on what GoogleShare is. Consider your searches "Tom Cruise" + "Scientology" "John Travolta" + "Scientology" What you're computing when you compute … the GoogleShare here is the percentage of searches for "Scientology" that also contain "Tom Cruise" versus the percentage of searches for "Scientology" that also contain "John Travolta". So the way …

snippet.title: Q: Computing GoogleShare of N Terms
snippet.description: I need guidance in how I should compute the GoogleShare of several terms.
